intro:
My name is Jorge J. Pereda, and I am a passionate and experienced web developer with a strong background in database management, frontend development, and extensive knowledge of raw JavaScript and TypeScript. I am very interested in the Web Developer position at your company, and I believe my skills and experience would make me an excellent candidate for this role.

I have several years of experience working with various database systems, such as MongoDB, MSSQL, and MySQL. I am well-versed in designing, implementing, and maintaining databases, and have also worked on optimizing database performance and security. I have a solid understanding of SQL and NoSQL and am comfortable using both types of databases depending on the project's needs.

In terms of frontend development, I have worked with Angular in projects and have extensive experience in developing scalable and user-friendly web applications. I also have experience using Vue.js in certain parts of my projects to enhance user experience and improve website performance. Moreover, I am proficient in raw JavaScript and TypeScript, which allows me to create efficient and maintainable code for a wide range of applications.

In addition to my technical expertise, I am an excellent communicator and team player, with the ability to quickly adapt to a new work environment and technologies. I am also results-oriented and am keen on delivering high-quality products that exceed client expectations.

I look forward to the opportunity to contribute to you with my skills and experience and to be a part of your successful team. Please do not hesitate to contact me if you would like to know more about me or if you need any additional information. I look forward to hearing from you soon.

In fact, this webiste is made in Angular with all the data saved in a NoSQL DB (MongoDB). This website can you find in one of my repositories in my gitHub feed below.
